directions: Spread about a tablespoon of brie (including the rind) on the crackers. Top with a thin slice of pear. Coarsely grind black pepper on the pears.
ingredients: 12 water crackers, or more as needed
1 ripe pear - halved, cored, thinly sliced
Freshly ground black pepper, coarse grind
title: Chef John's Brie with Ripe Pear and Black Pepper
